remarks: The projective map of the GLB of a set of lattice elements.  Index-set version of ~ pmapglb2N , where we read ` S ` as ` S ( i ) ` .  Extension of Theorem 15.5.2 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 62 that allows ` I = (/) ` . (Contributed by NM, 21-Jan-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
